sentences.sContent: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.sCn: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.sContent: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.sCn: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.sContent: ...accounting for nearly 70% of global fresh water consumption...
...Users can learn the best ways to safely store food and keep it fresh longer...
...which is estimated to have the biggest reserves of fresh water on the planet...
...It is estimated that Antarctica boasts of the richest reserves of fresh water on earth...
...there is fresh hope that we might go green after all...
...human use of fresh water has increased at more than double the rate of population growth...
...the Fed's announcement might have attracted new home and car buyers and prompted credit card holders to rack up fresh charges...
...To address the problem requires fresh thinking from governments about how people train for their working lives and what a living wage should be...
...A child’s world is supposed to be fresh and new and beautiful...
